This "new user" has an open account (and should not be added).
CHECK_NEW_USER_INVALID_USERNAME_EXISTS - Static variable in class com.revature.banking.services.UserService
This "new user"'s username already existed so they need to choose another one
CHECK_NEW_USER_TAXID_MISMATCH - Static variable in class com.revature.banking.services.UserService
This new user's first and last don't match the existing tax id.

This "new user" is already in the system but has no open accounts so they can create a new login and attach it to a new account.
